Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: serviceaccount edgemesh-agent in kubeedge namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Viewing secrets at the cluster-scope is akin to cluster-admin in most clusters as there are typically at least one service accounts (their token stored in a secret) bound to cluster-admin directly or a role/clusterrole that gives similar permissions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'edgemesh-agent' shouldn't have access to manage resource 'secrets'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Manage secrets are not allowed. Remove resource 'secrets' from cluster role

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage all resources
Misconfigurations.Description: Full control of the cluster resources, and therefore also root on all nodes where workloads can run and has access to all pods, secrets, and data.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'edgemesh-agent' shouldn't manage all resources
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove '*' from 'rules.resources'. Provide specific list of resources to be managed by cluster role

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage configmaps
Misconfigurations.Description: Some workloads leverage configmaps to store sensitive data or configuration parameters that affect runtime behavior that can be modified by an attacker or combined with another issue to potentially lead to compromise.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'edgemesh-agent' should not have access to resource 'configmaps' for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove write permission verbs for resource 'configmaps'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes networking
Misconfigurations.Description: The ability to control which pods get service traffic directed to them allows for interception attacks. Controlling network policy allows for bypassing lateral movement restrictions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'edgemesh-agent' should not have access to resources ["services", "endpoints", "endpointslices", "networkpolicies", "ingresses"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Networking resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrole edgemesh-agent in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrolebinding edgemesh-agent in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap edgemesh-agent-cfg in kubeedge namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-agent' of DaemonSet 'edgemesh-agent' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'set containers[].securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to 'false'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-agent' of DaemonSet 'edgemesh-agent' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Add 'ALL' to containers[].securityContext.capabilities.drop.

Misconfigurations.Title: Access to host network
Misconfigurations.Description: Sharing the host’s network namespace permits processes in the pod to communicate with processes bound to the host’s loopback adapter.
Misconfigurations.Message: DaemonSet 'edgemesh-agent' should not set 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' to true
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Do not set 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' to true.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs as root user
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-agent' of DaemonSet 'edgemesh-agent' should set 'securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true.

Misconfigurations.Title: Image tag ":latest" used
Misconfigurations.Description: It is best to avoid using the ':latest' image tag when deploying containers in production. Doing so makes it hard to track which version of the image is running, and hard to roll back the version.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-agent' of DaemonSet 'edgemesh-agent' should specify an image tag
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Use a specific container image tag that is not 'latest'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-agent' of DaemonSet 'edgemesh-agent' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Change 'containers[].securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to 'true'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Privileged
Misconfigurations.Description: Privileged containers share namespaces with the host system and do not offer any security. They should be used exclusively for system containers that require high privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-agent' of DaemonSet 'edgemesh-agent' should set 'securityContext.privileged' to false
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Change 'containers[].securityContext.privileged' to 'false'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-agent' of DaemonSet 'edgemesh-agent' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsUser' to an integer > 10000.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-agent' of DaemonSet 'edgemesh-agent' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to an integer > 10000.

Misconfigurations.Title: hostPath volumes mounted
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'HostPath Volumes', HostPath volumes must be forbidden.
Misconfigurations.Message: DaemonSet 'edgemesh-agent' should not set 'spec.template.volumes.hostPath'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Do not set 'spec.volumes[*].hostPath'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.securityContext.seccompProfile.type', 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.seccompProfile' and 'spec.initContainers[*].securityContext.seccompProfile' to 'RuntimeDefault' or undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container edgemesh-agent of daemonset edgemesh-agent in kubeedge namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: daemonset edgemesh-agent in kubeedge namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: serviceaccount edgemesh-server in kubeedge namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Viewing secrets at the cluster-scope is akin to cluster-admin in most clusters as there are typically at least one service accounts (their token stored in a secret) bound to cluster-admin directly or a role/clusterrole that gives similar permissions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'edgemesh-server' shouldn't have access to manage resource 'secrets'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Manage secrets are not allowed. Remove resource 'secrets' from cluster role

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrole edgemesh-server in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrolebinding edgemesh-server in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID

Misconfigurations.Message: configmap edgemesh-server-cfg in kubeedge namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges

Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-server' of Deployment 'edgemesh-server' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'set containers[].securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to 'false'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-server' of Deployment 'edgemesh-server' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Add 'ALL' to containers[].securityContext.capabilities.drop.

Misconfigurations.Title: Access to host network
Misconfigurations.Description: Sharing the host’s network namespace permits processes in the pod to communicate with processes bound to the host’s loopback adapter.
Misconfigurations.Message: Deployment 'edgemesh-server' should not set 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' to true
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Do not set 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' to true.

Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'edgemesh-server' of Deployment 'edgemesh-server' should specify an image tag

Misconfigurations.Message: Deployment 'edgemesh-server' should not set 'spec.template.volumes.hostPath'
